title: EssentialsSpawn插件有什么功能？服务器没有这个插件可以吗
author: Missez
txt_content: 如题EssentialsSpawn插件有什么功能？服务器没有这个插件可以吗

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Missez 发表于 2018-3-1 21:53
请问什么插件可以代替？
比如这个 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-293958-1-1.html 它能把玩家的出生点和复活点固定住

而ess的虽然也有这个功能 但是问题很多

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
这个插件可以控制玩家登陆的地点 和复活的地点 没啥用 有其他插件代替

covers basic player spawning, this plugin lets you define the place people return to on death, as well as the place people initially end up when joining the server. The position can be changed ingame by a player with the correct permissions, and can be configured for everyone or per group.

replies.author: Missez
replies.txt_content:
